title: To catch a trout
creator_credit: Wilf Gray and Wilf Gray Film Productions
brief_description: Lakes in British Columbia are scientifically stocked and trout population controlled by the Fisheries Authority. Surveys are carried out to monitor the ecological balance of the lakes.
creator_credit_for_label: Wilf Gray and Wilf Gray Film Productions
